Class Target

java.lang.Object
  Target
Direct Known Subclasses:
blood, Duck, GoldenDuck, RareDuck
public abstract class Target
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
zacharymailloux Abstract Class Target: This is an abstract class with the methods setVisisble, isVisible, isInside as well as numerous drawing methods.
